page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: This information that the shops exist because they provide for day to day needs which would not justify a journey to Brighton Town Centre. {HOLLINGBURY.}The houses of Hollingbury are mainly council homes although some have been bought.They are nearly all semi-detached houses with modest gardens.They are built out of red brick although some have been plastered over and others painted.Not many houses had garages although garages could be rented. {WESTDENE.}The houses nearer Eldred Avenue are the oldest part of Westdene.This area was built in the 1930's.The houses have a part timber frontage.Higher up nearer Westdene school the houses were built in the 1960's.Bungalows and two story houses surround the area,usually brick and replacement windows.
